articles.title: Emergence of replication timing during early mammalian development - Nature.com
articles.description: Genome-wide replication timing maps of mouse embryos from the zygote to the blastocyst stage were generated using single-cell Repli-seq, shedding light on the establishment of the epigenome at the beginning of mammalian development.

articles.title: Minute-scale oscillatory sequences in medial entorhinal cortex - Nature.com
articles.description: Neural population activity in the medial entorhinal cortex of mice can be organized into ultraslow oscillatory sequences, with periods extending up to the minute range.
